00019 #ifndef _IPL98_VECTOR2D_H
00020 #define _IPL98_VECTOR2D_H
00021 
00022 #include "../../../points/point2d.h"
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 template<class T>
00038 class CVector2D : public CPoint2D<T>
00039 {
00040         public: // attributes
00041         private: // attributes
00042         public: // methods
00044                 CVector2D();
00046                 CVector2D(T x,T y);
00048                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){m_x=V2D.GetX();m_y=V2D.GetY();}
00050                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D(const CPoint2D<POLY>& P2D){m_x=P2D.GetX();m_y=P2D.GetY();}
00051 
00053                 template<class POLY> operator CVector2D<POLY>(){return CVector2D<POLY>(m_x,m_y);}
00054 
00057 
00058                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T>& operator=(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){m_x=V2D.GetX();m_y=V2D.GetY();return *this;};
00060                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T>& operator+=(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){m_x+=V2D.GetX();m_y+=V2D.GetY();return *this;};
00062                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T>& operator-=(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){m_x-=V2D.GetX();m_y-=V2D.GetY();return *this;};
00065                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T>& operator*=(const POLY& Factor){m_x*=Factor;m_y*=Factor;return *this;}
00068                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T>& operator/=(const POLY& Factor){m_x/=Factor;m_y/=Factor;return *this;}
00070 
00072 
00073                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator==(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D) const{return ((m_x==V2D.GetX()) && (m_y==V2D.GetY()));}
00075                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator!=(const CVector2D<T>& V2D) const{return ((m_x!=V2D.GetX()) || (m_y!=V2D.GetY()));}
00077 
00079 
00080                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T> operator+(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){return CVector2D<T>(m_x+V2D.GetX(),m_y+V2D.GetY());}
00082                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T> operator-(const CVector2D<POLY>& V2D){return CVector2D<T>(m_x-V2D.GetX(),m_y-V2D.GetY());}
00089                 inline T operator*(const CVector2D<T>& Vector) const {return (m_x*Vector.GetX()+m_y*Vector.GetY());}
00092                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T> operator*(const POLY& Factor) const {return CVector2D<T>(m_x*Factor,m_y*Factor);}
00095                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T> operator/(const POLY& Factor) const {return CVector2D<T>(m_x/Factor,m_y/Factor);}
00097                 
00101                 friend CVector2D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CVector2D<T>& V2D);
00102                 
00103                 
00107                 template<class POLY> inline T GetDot(const POLY& Vector) const {return (m_x*Vector.GetX()+m_y*Vector.GetY());}
00110                 inline double GetModulus() const;
00115                 inline double GetAngle() const;
00122                 template<class POLY> inline double GetAngle(const CVector2D<POLY>& Vec) const {T p=GetDot(Vec)/(GetModulus()*Vec.GetModulus());if ((m_x*Vec.GetY()-m_y*Vec.GetX())>=0) {return atan2(sqrt(1-p*p),p);}else{return -atan2(sqrt(1-p*p),p);}}
00126                 template<class POLY> inline CVector2D<T> GetProjection(const CVector2D<POLY>& Vec) const {return Vec*GetDot(Vec)/(Vec.GetX()*Vec.GetX()+Vec.GetY()*Vec.GetY());}
00130                 template<class POLY> inline double GetDeterminant(const CVector2D<POLY>& Vec) const {return m_x*Vec.GetY() - m_y*Vec.GetX();}
00134                 template<class POLY> inline bool IsParallel(const CVector2D<POLY>& Vec) const{return GetDeterminant(Vec)==0;}
00138                 template<class POLY> inline bool IsOrthogonal(const CVector2D<POLY>& Vec) const{return GetDot(Vec)==0;}
00142                 inline bool Normalize(){T L=GetModulus();if (L!=0){m_x/=L;m_y/=L;return true;}else{return false;}}
00143 };
00144 
00148 
00149 template <class T>
00150 inline double CVector2D<T>::GetModulus() const
00151 {
00152         return sqrt(m_x*m_x+m_y*m_y);
00153 }
00154 
00155 template <class T>
00156 inline double CVector2D<T>::GetAngle() const
00157 {
00158         return atan2(m_y,m_x);
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <class T>
00162 CVector2D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CVector2D<T>& V2D)
00163 {
00164         return CVector2D<T>(V2D.GetX()*Factor,V2D.GetY()*Factor);
00165 }
